title: Nike's Wings
description: With all she'd been through, her skills at parkour and freerunning, for the top secret group within the CIA Nike was the perfect candidate. She would be trained to be the assassin's assassin. Until she began to question. Questions were dangerous, though. All Nike wanted was to be 'real' again, whatever real was... Ty Connor, ex-CIA, has just been named to head a new branch of Homeland Security. A fast-response group called the NIO. For the first time Nike has a chance at redemption, and more...If she dares to take it.
author: Valerie Douglas
